overview: Puneet is a pioneer in innovative enterprise methodologies and tools to help companies deliver on large scale data driven applications. He’s also an experienced technologist with a track record for building world-class products. In his role of CTO at TIBCO Software, he was responsible for the incubation and subsequent business unit for a highly successful product (TIBCO BusinessEvents) in the complex events processing space (CEP). Puneet holds a BE from IIT Mumbai.
